opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Federal Communications Commission v. Nextwave Personal Communications Inc. And Arctic Slope Regional Corp. v. Nextwave Personal Communications Inc.

opinion:
535 U.S. 904

FEDERAL COMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION
v.
NEXTWAVE PERSONAL COMMUNICATIONS INC. ET AL. and
ARCTIC SLOPE REGIONAL CORP. ET AL.
v.
NEXTWAVE PERSONAL COMMUNICATIONS INC. ET AL.

No. 01-653.

No. 01-657.

Supreme Court of the United States.

March 4, 2002.

1

C. A. D. C. Cir. Motion of Urban Comm-North Carolina, Inc., for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae in No. 01-653 granted. Certiorari granted, cases consolidated, and a total of one hour allotted for oral argument. Reported below: 254 F. 3d 130.
